Health data is personal data and is considered sensitive. It is subject to special protection under the law (European regulation on the protection of personal data - RGPD, Loi Informatique et Libertés, Code de la santé publique, etc.) in order to guarantee respect for the privacy of individuals.

question.question: Which of the following best describes the legal framework that provides special protection for health data in Europe?
question.option_a: The European regulation on the protection of personal data (RGPD) and the Code of Health Ethics
question.option_b: The European regulation on the protection of personal data (RGPD) and the Loi Informatique et Libertés
question.option_c: The European regulation on the protection of personal data (RGPD) and the Code of Medical Ethics
question.option_d: The European regulation on the protection of personal data (RGPD) and the European Health Data Directive
